summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new registration flow (Ad, Soyad, E-posta, Şifre with email verification), user account deletion, profile update, and admin user deletion. All features working correctly.

test_results.registration_step1_fields: PASS - Ad, Soyad, E-posta, Şifre, Şifre Tekrar fields all present

test_results.registration_verify_email: PASS - Email verification creates user account
test_results.user_delete_own_account: PASS - User can delete own account via /auth/delete-account
test_results.profile_update_all_fields: PASS - Profile update works (display_name, institution, role, province, district, bio)
test_results.admin_delete_user_button_ui: PASS - 'Sil' button visible on each user row in admin panel
test_results.dashboard_profile_tab: PASS - Profile tab shows all fields
test_results.dashboard_delete_account_button: PASS - 'Hesabı Sil' button visible in Profile tab
test_results.dashboard_profile_edit: PASS - Profile edit mode shows all editable fields

context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features tested and working: 1) New registration flow with Ad, Soyad, E-posta, Şifre fields 2) Email verification with mocked code (auto-filled in dev mode) 3) User can delete own account from Dashboard Profile tab 4) Admin can delete users from Admin Dashboard 5) Profile update works with all fields (kurum, pozisyon, il, ilçe, bio)
